document-title:
Here's an example of how to add a title to an HTML document using the tag: ```html <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>My Website Title

Welcome to my website!

This is some content on my website.

``` In this example, the tag is used within the <head> section of the HTML document to specify the title of the page. The text "My Website Title" will appear in the browser's title bar and may also be used by search engines and other tools to identify the page.
